title: Update app branding from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI' in draft

requirements.text: Update the application title in frontend/index.html from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'

quotes: you forgot to change the name on the app in the draft

acceptanceCriteria: The <title> tag in index.html displays 'Axora AI'
Browser tab shows 'Axora AI' when the app is loaded

requirements.text: Update the Header component logo text from 'Hollow AI' to 'Axora AI'

quotes: you forgot to change the name on the app in the draft

acceptanceCriteria: The header displays 'Axora AI' as the application name
Logo text is visible and properly styled

requirements.text: Replace any remaining references to 'Hollow AI' with 'Axora AI' throughout the frontend interface including comments and accessibility labels

quotes: you forgot to change the name on the app in the draft

acceptanceCriteria: No instances of 'Hollow AI' remain in user-facing text

constraints: Do not modify backend files for this branding change
Preserve all existing functionality and styling

Do not change any immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the visual design or theme
Updating backend actor names or canister configurations
